content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Three headed dragon of JarnThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Three headed dragon of Jarn
 Three headed dragon of Jarn was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.

The three headed dragon of Jarn, was a dragon defeated by Arrav in the Fourth Age.[1]

It is unknown whether Jarn refers to a location, a person, or some other title.

The three headed dragon of Jarn is not considered canon as the only mention of the dragon, in The Shield of Arrav book, was removed sometime during RuneScape Classic's lifespan.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Jarn was the first three headed dragon mentioned in RuneScape and predates the addition of the King Black Dragon by over a year.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ A R Wright, "The Shield of Arrav", Old School RuneScape. "Arrav is probably the best known hero of the 4th age. Amoung other achievements he was responsible for stopping the Orcish invasion and defeating the three headed dragon of Jarn."
